Real.definition: of or relating to real property [a action] see also real property at property b in the civil law of Louisiana
Real.origin: [Anglo-French, concerning land, property, or things (rather than persons), from Middle French, from Medieval Latin and Late Latin; Medieval Latin realis relating to things (in law), from Late Latin, actual, from Latin res thing, fact]

1 a.definition: of or relating to real property [a action] see alsoat

sub_terms.b: attached to a thing rather than a person [a obligation is transferred along with the thing to which it is attached] see alsocompare

3.definition: adjusted for inflation esp. to reflect actual purchasing power [ income]
